* **High Sales Rate:**  8 out of 9 potential buyers have purchased, indicating a strong likelihood of high-quality products. 
* **High Quality Proportion:** 5 out of 8 sales were high-quality, a 62.5% success rate. This is significantly higher than the 50% probability of a high-quality product.
